whine.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to complain in a sad annoying voice about something
whine.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The sergeant was whining about how hard he had been forced to work recently.
whine.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to make a long high sound because you are in pain or unhappy
whine.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He could hear the dog whining behind the door.
whine.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: if a machine whines, it makes a continuous high sound
